Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Beijing Mipai Culture Media Co., Ltd. (Abbreviated as: Jincheng Culture)

Founded in 2010, it is an integrated marketing one-stop advertising service organisation with film and television production as the core! The company has a professional brand integrating creativity/execution/marketing.

The planning and production team, "customer-centred and results-oriented", thinks about the value of video from a marketing perspective.

For more than 10 years, we have focussed on the development and production of promotional videos, commercial advertising and film and television projects, bringing together industry marketing experts and film and television experts to create creative services and video marketing tools such as film and television projects, commercial advertising, marketing communication, and business activities.

At present, it has served more than 200 well-known enterprises at home and abroad, more than 1,000 successful video cases and more than 100 marketing activities, involving the Internet, automobile, education, real estate, finance and other industries, including Shengxun, JD.com, Mengniu, China Mobile, China Unicom, Futian Cummins, Toyota Automobile, Wanwei Successful cases such as Education, Wanda Group, Huaxia Bank, Nanjing Bank and other enterprises have been trusted by customers and have become loyal and good partners on the marketing road.
